title: "Scientists Use Machine Learning To Supercharge Search for New Materials"
excerpt: "Deep-learning models developed by scientists are now capable of analyzing the extensive data produced by X-ray diffraction techniques. Researchers at the University of Rochester say deep learning can supercharge a technique that is already the gold standard for characterizing new materials."
